pathfinder.translation[0].definitions[0]: someone who goes ahead of a group and finds the best way through unknown land
pathfinder.translation[0].definitions[1]: a person who discovers new ways of doing things
pathfinder.translation[1].definitions[0]: a US government space programme in which NASA sent a spacecraft without people inside to Mars in 1997 in order to find out more information about the planet
pathfinder.translation[2].definitions[0]: a person or company that discovers a new way of doing something
The company is a pathfinder in terms of e-commerce.
